title: Tristana's cannon
body: All the animations Tristana does with her cannon are not correctly displayed (including her back-to-base animation). The Cannon gets bugged and that leaves the poor yordle gunner without those cool animations from the marvellous update. I think this has happened since 5.13 or so, and I would like it to be resolved ASAP because Trist is one of my mains...

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! This is a known issue and we're working on a fix!
